bodydiv.p: Requests for information are formal requests by the Board for information or feedback on a matter related to technical projects or broader consultations. Examples of appropriate topics for a request for information include seeking comment on the Boardâ€™s work plan every five years, post-implementation reviews, or help in assessing the practical implications of a potential financial reporting requirement.
